text: What version of bootstrap does the CMS use these days?
HubSpot uses a stripped down version of bootstrap 2. That said most devs on here use their own frameworks or full custom code by just overriding their grid while keeping the spirit of it.
Oh really? Unless open source, I often find CMS solutions are quite tight on the flexibility with accessing core code. Makes this HS CMS even more intriguing.

you can actually view the grid code by inspecting your HS site and opening the layout.css file, that small file is it.
There is some additional optional CSS in the HS boilerplate but you can change that to your liking.
